sqlMap.select: select HEE_ID, HEE_GRADUATE_INSTITUTION, HEE_SCHOOL_TYPE, HEE_ENTRY_TIME, HEE_GRADUATED_TIME, HEE_COLLEGE, HEE_SPECIALITY, HEE_EDUCATION, HEE_SCHOOL_SYSTEM, HEE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_EDUCATION_NATURE, HEE_EDUCATION_COMPLETE_STATUS, HEE_DEGREE, HEE_DEGREE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_TYPE, HEE_EDUCATION_COPY, HEE_DEGREE_COPY, HEE_REMARK, II_ID from B_HIGHER_EDUCATION_EXPERIENCE where HEE_ID = #heeId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, c.* from ( select HEE_ID, HEE_GRADUATE_INSTITUTION, HEE_SCHOOL_TYPE, HEE_ENTRY_TIME, HEE_GRADUATED_TIME, HEE_COLLEGE, HEE_SPECIALITY, HEE_EDUCATION, HEE_SCHOOL_SYSTEM, HEE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_EDUCATION_NATURE, HEE_EDUCATION_COMPLETE_STATUS, HEE_DEGREE, HEE_DEGREE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_TYPE, HEE_EDUCATION_COPY, HEE_DEGREE_COPY, HEE_REMARK, II_ID from B_HIGHER_EDUCATION_EXPERIENCE ) c) WHERE NUMROW >= $ibegin$ AND NUMROW < $iend$

SELECT count(1) as ID from ( select HEE_ID, HEE_GRADUATE_INSTITUTION, HEE_SCHOOL_TYPE, HEE_ENTRY_TIME, HEE_GRADUATED_TIME, HEE_COLLEGE, HEE_SPECIALITY, HEE_EDUCATION, HEE_SCHOOL_SYSTEM, HEE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_EDUCATION_NATURE, HEE_EDUCATION_COMPLETE_STATUS, HEE_DEGREE, HEE_DEGREE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_TYPE, HEE_EDUCATION_COPY, HEE_DEGREE_COPY, HEE_REMARK, II_ID from B_HIGHER_EDUCATION_EXPERIENCE )
sqlMap.insert: insert into B_HIGHER_EDUCATION_EXPERIENCE (HEE_ID, HEE_GRADUATE_INSTITUTION, HEE_SCHOOL_TYPE, HEE_ENTRY_TIME, HEE_GRADUATED_TIME, HEE_COLLEGE, HEE_SPECIALITY, HEE_EDUCATION, HEE_SCHOOL_SYSTEM, HEE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_EDUCATION_NATURE, HEE_EDUCATION_COMPLETE_STATUS, HEE_DEGREE, HEE_DEGREE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_TYPE, HEE_EDUCATION_COPY, HEE_DEGREE_COPY, HEE_REMARK, II_ID) values (#heeId#, #heeGraduateInstitution#, #heeSchoolType#, #heeEntryTime#, #heeGraduatedTime#, #heeCollege#, #heeSpeciality#, #heeEducation#, #heeSchoolSystem#, #heeCertificateNo#, #heeEducationNature#, #heeEducationCompleteStatus#, #heeDegree#, #heeDegreeCertificateNo#, #heeType#, #heeEducationCopy#, #heeDegreeCopy#, #heeRemark#, #iiId#)
sqlMap.update: update B_HIGHER_EDUCATION_EXPERIENCE set HEE_GRADUATE_INSTITUTION = #heeGraduateInstitution#, HEE_SCHOOL_TYPE = #heeSchoolType#, HEE_ENTRY_TIME = #heeEntryTime#, HEE_GRADUATED_TIME = #heeGraduatedTime#, HEE_COLLEGE = #heeCollege#, HEE_SPECIALITY = #heeSpeciality#, HEE_EDUCATION = #heeEducation#, HEE_SCHOOL_SYSTEM = #heeSchoolSystem#, HEE_CERTIFICATE_NO = #heeCertificateNo#, HEE_EDUCATION_NATURE = #heeEducationNature#, HEE_EDUCATION_COMPLETE_STATUS = #heeEducationCompleteStatus#, HEE_DEGREE = #heeDegree#, HEE_DEGREE_CERTIFICATE_NO = #heeDegreeCertificateNo#, HEE_TYPE = #heeType#, HEE_EDUCATION_COPY = #heeEducationCopy#, HEE_DEGREE_COPY = #heeDegreeCopy#, HEE_REMARK = #heeRemark#, II_ID = #iiId# where HEE_ID = #heeId#
sqlMap.select:
select HEE_ID, HEE_GRADUATE_INSTITUTION, HEE_SCHOOL_TYPE, HEE_ENTRY_TIME, HEE_GRADUATED_TIME, HEE_COLLEGE, HEE_SPECIALITY, HEE_EDUCATION, HEE_SCHOOL_SYSTEM, HEE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_EDUCATION_NATURE, HEE_EDUCATION_COMPLETE_STATUS, HEE_DEGREE, HEE_DEGREE_CERTIFICATE_NO, HEE_TYPE, HEE_EDUCATION_COPY, HEE_DEGREE_COPY, HEE_REMARK, II_ID from B_HIGHER_EDUCATION_EXPERIENCE where 1=1
II_ID = #iiId#
order by HEE_TYPE
